title:
Breaking Barriers.
Reaching Everyone.
content:
AccessiFly helped VPC.lv achieve WCAG 2.1 AA compliance, making their research platform accessible to all users regardless of ability.

The implementation improved navigation for screen reader users and reduced accessibility-related support requests by 34%.
image_alt: iPad showing vpc.lv website with accessibility widget

title:
Empowering Research.
Enabling Access.
content: Dataverse.lv integrated AccessiFly to support diverse researchers and students. Features like voice navigation, contrast modes, and multi-language support transformed accessibility for thousands of academic users.
image_alt: iPad showing dataverse.lv platform with accessibility features

title:
Building Inclusivity.
Driving Impact.
content: DV.dataverse.lv adopted AccessiFly to meet global accessibility standards. Researchers with visual impairments, motor disabilities, and language barriers now access datasets seamlessly.
image_alt: iPad showing dv.dataverse.lv with high-contrast mode enabled
